頓.definition: to stop; to pause; to arrange; to lay out; to kowtow; to stamp (one's foot); at once; classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

頓悟.definition: a flash of realization; the truth in a flash; a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)

頓挫.definition: a transition (stop and change) in spoken sound, music or in brush strokes; a cadence; punctuated by a transition; with syncopated cadence (brush stroke in painting)

頓號.definition: enumeration comma (、) (used to separate words or phrases in a list)

頓覺.definition: to feel suddenly; to realize abruptly
